p: As indicated in Table 2, several health-promoting metabolites, especially those which are reported for a multitude of antiviral potential, have been produced in many plants through micropropagation in vitro. For instance, Santoro et al. (2013) reported the production of higher quantities of pulegone and menthofuran in Mentha piperita, when micro-propagated in vitro under the effects of 4-indol-3-ylbutyric acid (IBA) and 6-benzylaminopurine (BAP).
